review: My son Abeer Sharma had a fall right at beginning of Corona last year, he dislocated his left elbow, and required surgery. Dr Rujuta operated and has been available all through the year. She's excellent ** *** ****** and has been just a call away. In fact there have been times when she's followed up on his well being. Abeer is doing fine and has fully recovered all thanks to Dr Rujuta, and Big Salute to her for being there especially in these tough times of Covid. Thanks a lot Doctor, for being our peace of mind and helping Abeer do the cart wheels again. 🙏😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My son Aditya Singh 6 year old has got right hand crush injury in his Right Hand Thumb.  He under gone surgery in varanasi where I live but it is unsuccessful and after one month bone is in three part . The condition is very bad for me and for my son. 
                                    My younger brother who live in Mumbai then he decided to go in nanavati hospital where we meet to Dr Rujuta Mehta and we told the situation the case is complicated after that doctor explained us the complete thing in very excellent way like a family member or in different way like a friend. 
                                           After that my son gone to second surgery it is operated by Dr Rujuta mam gone very well . Now he and myself feeling well just because of Dr Rujuta Mehta because I'm worried for my son in study in writing part how he will able to write✍ what he will he do in future. I'm very thankful to Dr Rujuta Mehta and her staff. I have no words to express it.

context: Pediatric Foot and Ankle Conditions,Pediatric orthopedic Surgery,Orthopedic Surgery,
review: Dr. Rujuta Mehta is the best when it comes to working with children with orthopaedic conditions, she is brilliant in dealing with kids and parents who are under lot of stress because of what their child might be going through. We’ve been consulting her for over 9 years for our sons club foot condition and we’re forever grateful to her for everything she has done. We’ve recommended her to several patients and continue to do so, that’s how good she is.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Mehta was very kind and understanding while treating our young son's leg fracture. She reassured us and explained everything very well and clearly.

review: No issues about the doctor... it's the dressing room fees/charges that Nanavati charged me... they were exorbitant!! 1700+ for a 15-20 mins of usage!!! That's extortion. Please do not charge so high fees or inform patients in advance
